name: Your life is my money
description:
UPDATE: added a  post-LD patch which adds a few fixes and tweaks to prevent the player from leaving the game area and getting out of bounds.

As the leader of your village, it's your duty to travel the harsh desert and sacrifice cattle to the god of the Fire Mountain to pray for the village's survival.

But in this world, cattle is used as currency. You will need to part ways from it in order to progress, haggling with merchants to acquire resources or simply to bribe a lazy woodworker. However, you can also gather treasures (such as fruit or cloth) and trade them back for cattle. And of course, when talking about money you can't forget thieves, who will try to steal your cattle and take it to their hideouts. Defend your herd and kill the bandits, or risk losing all your 'funds'.
But that's not all: the sheep, goats and cows you will conduct to the God of the mountain each have another use.

Prepare to spend money in order to make money.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse Button to attack with your spear
  • F to interact
  • Q to stop the cattle close to you from advancing

Code by Jofer

Art by me

Music by Ryunocore https://soundcloud.com/ryunocore

The game is probably buggy and you might run into issues, if so please let us know! We had to rush because of the time constraints but we'll do ourbest to fix it.
